name: Tubbles' Adventures
description:
Tubbles’ Adventure is a 3D lane-based platformer built for the PC and Xbox. The game features three different lanes for platform jumping, and adds challenges like stomping or shooting enemies and navigating tricky platform puzzles. One of Tubbles’ most distinct characteristics is its strong visual aesthetic, utilizing simple shapes and pastel colors to illustrate a tropical theme. Tubbles’ Adventure is a game suitable for children and adults who are seeking a change to a typical lane-swapping game, and who wish to be transported to a cute, tropical world.

        The game introduces these mechanics with a storyline involving our hero, Tubbles, who must navigate the Galapagos to gain the ability of flight to be reunited with his family.

  • Brandon Recce: Programmer and Producer
  • Landon Shoaf: Designer
  • Aaron Anderson: Artist and Designer
  • Luka Redmond: Artist
  • Rose Frewin: Artist
